lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everybody, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first up, which is Ravensburger. Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Boomerang, the orbital outlaw? The Sinister Stick, the Aerodynamic Desperado? No? Boomerang? Not ringing a bell?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No Boomerang? Boomerang, the spinniest supervillain of them all? No?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She said this was in the bag! I even wrote some new catch phrases, ready?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Ya!" Of course, in real life it would come back, I know how to use a boomerang.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did that boomerang have bullet holes in it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter) He made it out of cardboard for Boomerang! I think he used a piece of cardboard that had been used to do painting on before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And hang onto that costume, though, cause we'll use it later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm not going to lie, it is making me miss the Tick show, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just shouting your name, is your catchphrase?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And thank you, Ravensburger. (laughing) Our second sponsor tonight, our friends since beginning of campaign two, D&D Beyond.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The book is also available in a hard cover, like this, as well as eBook, audio book formats, and actually there-- I got to show a couple more things in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We also have some awesome interior art.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It'll put you right back in the campaign.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And here's a moment that some people are familiar with this campaign will recognize.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Put your fate in your hands--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to randomly pick a page here, because I can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He can do whatever he wants.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The very first battle we streamed, out in Kraghammer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, was that the-- then the serpent thingy come out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't say it, they'll have to get the book to find out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then you found that hidden door, and I knew we were in the wrong, we were outclassed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura, you got some things to talk about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have to show you guys this, doo doo doo doo, I don't know if you can see it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There you go, look, it's great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And this is available along with the Mighty Nein entire set in the U.S. and the U.K. stores right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really good, Tal; I don't know if you've seen it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I know where you're going with that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Molly comes creeping back, and all of a sudden he's a power.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why is Caduceus throwing himself off the side of the ship? (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please stay in that the entire episode.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will not stay in this! Boomerang!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On that note, our announcements are complete, so let's jump into tonight's episode of Critical Role.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Boomerang! (water bubbling) (thunder rumbling) (explosion) ♪ Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Critical Role ♪ ♪ Mighty Nein ♪ ♪ Roll the dice ♪ ♪ The adventure begins, they were always beside you ♪ ♪ Your nerdy best friends, and the DM to guide you ♪ ♪ And they rise from the flames for the battles ahead ♪ ♪ Villains beware 'cause you're about to be dead ♪ ♪ They got magic and flair ♪ ♪ They got falchions and cunning ♪ ♪ They don't see over there ♪ ♪ There's a monster incoming ♪ ♪ Inspiration is waiting ♪ ♪ Rise up, don't think twice ♪ ♪ Put your fate in your hands ♪ ♪ Take a chance, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Roll the dice ♪ ♪ Critical Role (roll the dice) ♪ ♪ Critical Role (roll the dice) ♪ ♪ Can you answer the call, diggin' deep in your soul ♪ ♪ As the legend unfolds ♪ ♪ Now it's your turn (your turn, your turn) ♪ ♪ To roll ♪ (flames whooshing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we left off, in the middle of this struggle and fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- combat round, we come to Beauregard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, you are still grappled in the claws of a charmed creature, who is now currently incapacitated and just clutching you in this tightened grip.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does disengage-- can I disengage from grapple if I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not as strong as it once was in the moment, because it is distracted.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, wait, it's contested strength roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel the jagged edges of the claw grind into the flesh and hurt just a bit, You're not going to get out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So incapacitated doesn't mean they let go of everything and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're just currently dazed by the spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In whatever state they were in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That wasn't a save throw, was it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'd like to think they do lose control of their bowels, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, yeah, we'll go with that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A terrifying smell of crustacean shit now completely fills the side of the boat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do crustaceans poop? Is it like long strings like fish, or is it--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's pretty liquid, it's pretty liquid, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. ♪ The more you know! ♪ Beauregard, what you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess I'm stuck here, I might as well punch it in the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you used your action to break through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (forlornly) But I can do bonus action Flurry of Blows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't do Flurry of Blows, because I believe you have to use your action as part of an attack action, but you can get--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I can do an extra attack? Can I do an extra attack?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keep pushing with the lower lip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll allow it, go for it. You can make one attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sadly) "I'm a monk of the Cobalt Soul."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So does it have to be a standard attack, or can I do-- can I do my--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thought for sure she'd get out of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's an action, that's an action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's as weak as a wizard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This-- believe it or not, there are some circumstances where a monk can't do everything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So wait, are you saying I can just attack?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa, that was a weird roll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it was, but it was a 17, so I take it for 27.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I say, in that moment before he was stunned, as she punched him did he move at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he's no longer charmed, as you punched the charm out of him, so-- (gurgly growling) and now it's-- the impact, this delayed reaction as you slam it right in the area where the metal plates hit, or the hard crustacean plates hit, and it seems to have sent a shock through his nervous system, and he's currently trying to recalibrate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's still holding onto you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just, the tendons are all locked up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you still have to break free.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Veth, where are you on the ship?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm towards the bow-- the stern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Fjord, you're up. Yasha, you're on deck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She is on the ship! Is she on the railing, or did she hop over in both feet are on the deck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Starts stepping over the edge and is drawing both the rapier and the dagger that she's holding out to the edges--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: God, I really just want to Spartan and kick her off the boat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And if you miss you'll look real dumb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter) ♪ And my strength ain't the best ♪

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That sounds win-win to me. I'd go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you have the Eldritch Blast that blasts people back or something? No?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With my bonus action, I'm going to cast a Hexblade's Curse at Avantika.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say she is currently cursed by you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll use my 30 feet to run to where it lies on the deck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you're going to run this way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gets an attack of opportunity against you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hangin' on the side of the boat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits. Is there any bane on her? There's not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bane doesn't help the attack roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, I believe bane is saving throws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And attack rolls as well, you're right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And with my Armor of Hexes, if I roll a four or higher, she misses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which she does, I got a five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So swings with the rapier and the dark shadows that currently swirl around her torso reach out and grab her arm and pull it just wide out of the way, and it swings past your body as you rush over.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Standing over the cloven crystal, with it between my feet, I'm going to use my--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter) Get back in me, cloven crystal!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to Create Marine Layer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This fog lasts for 10 minutes, spreads around corners and cannot be dispersed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, did you can just say that you and your allies can see through the fog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If they're right next to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so if we wander into it we won't be able to see it until we get next to Fjord?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just lost a visibility on half the ship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's his battle cry, whenever he uses that feature.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so, since I see that Beau is grappled, I'm going to try and cut off the pincer from the lobstrosity.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So, just going to turn and try to start hacking away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Start hacking at the one that's currently holding on to Beauregard?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to try to hack away at that arm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you got your two attacks on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, first strike, as you swing wide with a blade, carve through the heavy chunk of its body, you watch as part of the armor that blocks the part of the face is now carved in two, and this dark purple viscera is now hanging out and bleeding as its clicking sound has now become this warbling-- (grunting) it's in pain.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, let's see if we can do a little more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, okay, that would be a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not long for this world if this were to continue, but it is still holding onto Beauregard best it can.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so then as my bonus action, I would like to use Zealous Presence and let out a battle cry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Which gives 10 other creatures in 60 feet advantage on attack rolls and saving throws.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- so we can fall in love with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you're just outside her range.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's done it once or twice before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, it's okay, it's my fault, I should've been closer to you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, no, aren't you up on the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My duplicate is next to you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like I've used it before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's for one round, until Yasha's next turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that finishes your go Yasha?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, she goes with the creatures?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well she's going before them, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very interesting." And is going to dart into the fog, is going to rush past you, and is going to make an investigation check with disadvantage because of the fog that's in this space.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you pick it up or did you just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with the rapier in her other hand, she stands up-- No, that's all of her movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But she currently has the crystal in her possession and learns--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's in fog, so we did not see her pick it up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So everyone outside the fog can't see her, only Fjord sees her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All you saw was her vanish into the fog after Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are lost in fog and everything around you just went fucking--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The last thing I saw was Fjord do a thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everyone on this side of the ship, once this fog's up, wouldn't have been able to see her enter into it either, right? Like isn't it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Only probably Yasha and Beau would have any idea--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At most you would have just seen her just dart into the fog and that's it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I see above the fog since I was up on the stairs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The fog is 20 feet in a full radius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Crawling up onto this side of the ship, of her, you see this weird almost toad-like demon creature--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some sort of-- you can make an arcana check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is being held here for a time by some sort of magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to come over to you for one strike here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then one more time, it's going to-- that's cocked, actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you've got your stone, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then after it's like-- (hissing) It vanishes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to appear right behind Jester on the staircase.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you feel these feet hit the wood behind you as you glance over, and the thing that you just saw assault Caleb is now behind you-- (grunting) its tongue dangling out over this jagged row of teeth on the bottom jaw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a pain in the ass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another one of these crustacean creatures crawls up on the opposite end.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's why he didn't want to go long the other-- last game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jumps down the center of the ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's really big! Wait, is it bigger, or is it just the angle of the camera?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The angle looks bigger. It's the same as the others.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I like to make sure my minis are properly treated.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be sea salt. That makes much more sense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, because I forgot Yasha, make a constitution saving throw for me, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Veth is like, "Hi, it's right behind me, isn't it?" (laughter) "It's right behind me."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 17? Oh wait, I can roll again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something I forgot last time, since we were at the end of the game, but the narrative is maintained.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Veth, you hear the-- (crash) and as you look over your shoulder, you see the creature right there bearing down on you, and it begins swiping at you both with its pincers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 points of bludgeoning damage, and you are grappled.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll Uncanny Dodge, I guess, to reduce it to seven, eight points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be in 23 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one deals-- ooh! 16 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a constitution saving throw for me, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17, you manage to resist the poison. You are fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I have to roll three times for each of those attacks to see if they hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And if it's six or higher-- the first one, first one's a natural 20, so it hits a dupe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so that's one dupe down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second one is a four, so it hits me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so the first hit did not go through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the third one, it must be an eight or higher, it was a nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so only the middle attack--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So mark off your damage on the first and third, which I did not recall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you have one duplicate left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Veth, you're up. Caleb you're on deck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does that mean I cannot complete--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't move, but you can--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- the somatic portions of a spell or the-- what's the VSM? I always fucking forget.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All that grappled means is your speed is zero until you break out of the grapple.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you can still do actions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can still do spells and actions and attacks and stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, so I can shoot, I can shoot this fucker if I wanted to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Even though I'm grappled, I'm going to hold my action until I see Avantika.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I will hold Phantasmal Force.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Caleb. Jester, you're on deck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to strafe the mage fishman up at the top and then curve back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go in a big curve, so I want to zap the lobster and I want to zap the mage, but then double back around and float over the top of the fog by about like 30 or 40 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you wanted to zoom up here and buzz all three of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or this way? You have 90 feet of movement, so you can go like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then this way, you mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lobster man, dude at the top, and then float on top, and then as my action, I'm going to cast Fly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But before we get to that, there are two attacks opportunity on you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just roll once and they'll both take it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They take nine points of lightning damage each.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 to hit, which I think misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and so you arc over and you cast Fly, so you are now flying up in the air over where this fog is, essentially.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so you are now flying, you are concentrating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finishing Caleb's turn. Jester, you're up, Caduceus, you're on deck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought the mage went after Caduceus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everything's messed up. Everything's messed up! (yells) Everything's concentration that I have! I'm freaking out!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I know right away for my bonus action, I'm just going to use my Spiritual Weapon that I have up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to hit the stunned one that's holding Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, roll attack on that and then damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (quietly) Is that my husband? With magic sequins?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's hard to tell, but I think it's you as a doctor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: People are like, "You need to make character head shots" and I'm like, "All right." (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was either that or a BTS shirt--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have all these dice, and I don't know which ones are which. I'm freaking out! (panicked grunting) Where's my eight? There they are, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's going to jump over the fucking edge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course, I don't know that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 18 points of damage with my serrated lollipop.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We had other ideas. I just threw them out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's barely hanging on and is like-- (grunting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, but the other guy's no longer stunned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes? You are going to cast...?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so, am I surrounded? Can I move?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: ♪ Stuck in the middle with you ♪

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that's a 20 foot sphere around me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe just mend those fences, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (chuckling) Nothing a silver tongue can't cure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "I've thought about your every day since you got your head turned around 180 degrees."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I'm sorry, I'm sorry, Matthew!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm freaking out! Okay, I take it back, I take it back, I'm going to cast Dawn instead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I'm going to cast Dawn, which is a 30 foot radius, 40 foot high cylinder of bright light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't have a template for that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Each creature in it must make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 foot radius, so yeah, that'll be--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Each creature, but I choose the location.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, where are you putting it, within 60 feet of you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is a pretty crowded deck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this a bad move, you guys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just so you know, you can only let it hit anything over here, because you have no visibility to see across the ship right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So where do you want it to land?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The door, in front of the door? (squeaking) Is it going to hit me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter) (muffled) Okay, I changed my mind again! (laughing) Spiritual Guardians, and then I swear Matt, this is the last thing, I'm going to do Spiritual Guardians.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I'm going to cast it at fifth level.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester just scrolls through her spells, like-- (scrolling sounds)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just trying to see how many circles you have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently, we're going through it-- there we go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so these only attack creatures that I choose?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That are within 15 feet of me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I'm going to choose everybody!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to choose every motherfucker on this boat! Okay, so that is a 5d8 radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For those who fail their wisdom save, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a wisdom save, but it's a concentration, which means I lose my duplicate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also Matt, I think as soon as I started to hold a spell, do I lose concentration on the other spell?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So they're no longer encumbered, the lobster people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right, they're no longer charmed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Affected creatures are halved in the area.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And when they start their turn there, they have to make a save.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which technically, when you cast it, is that entering the area?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, entering is when they're actually stepping into the space, or at the start of their turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pardon me, all right, does that finish your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Laura, that was a good move, we're going to celebrate it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Spiritual Guardian at fourth level.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many circles you got, Matt?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thing's going to look like the fucking Olympics soon.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: I don't know what the bonus would be, but I rolled a 10.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d20 and add two for your perception check with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense that this is a mother.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Absolutely the indication is that I'm being silly as a creature with them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Interesting point, between your physicality and the physicality of this creature: it appears more sallow than you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And based on the proximity to the ship and the arrangement of this pod you gather their interest with the large, moving barge of a ship that you are currently riding on is because they're looking for food.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I kick off any bit of the mage body into the water? Did we already do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They didn't leave it on there for three days.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, that's right, it's been three days.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like, "That'll come in handy later." Yeah, that's already been thrown in underwater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just hoping that this doesn't go poorly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So if I'm in this thing's form am I able to communicate, then?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'm going to try to say: Hungry? Hungry? Hungry? Hungry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It responds with a series of clicking and deep gurgling, rattling sounds from within its throat and you interpret it to mean, "Yes, but why do you help?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'll crest to the surface and (splashing) My head comes up and I swivel around and look for the big pink cow guy that I kind of remember and know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will gurgle at Caduceus and try to communicate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what you're-- You can understand me, but I-- Can you mime it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I suppose I could summon a greater demon for them to chew on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You'd have to kill it first, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But just drop it in the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do recall from previous experiences in which demons you've killed and/or summoned died, their bodies quickly turned to an ashy sludge and were burned away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've probably eaten half of them, but we could just dump the rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can Create Food and Water for ourselves and give them the tasty stuff we bought.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We bought mostly fish, I think.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to grab some of my fish.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would you know what you want to eat anyway?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I was going to say paint a giant fish.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if that'll survive the water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think if they got wet, they're no longer pastries.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I'm going to try to throw it so they'll catch it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ducks actually shouldn't eat bread, that's bad for-- oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just to keep things light and friendly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's nothing that calms a nervous mother like an erratic man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm 70 or 80 feet away from it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to play with your kids.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the two children slowly begin to pull away from the mother who allows them to and they snap them from underneath.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some of my fish that I bought.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't know if they eat the-- okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The boat has slowed down at this point, as the captain's seeing what you're doing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's dump all of our food.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It will take pretty much all of your rations to try and feed this family--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you will be out of food for the rest of this journey.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, we'll lure them in and then we'll eat them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have my boba within my form right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can we summon any fishies or anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have Create Food today.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anything else they want? I really like them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think most of our food is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The crew's not going to give up their food.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I want it to take it from my hand so I can pet it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually no, make this animal handling, this is what this'll be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Remember the dinosaur movie, "Baby" from the 80s?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The mouth opens and you can see rows and rows and rows of jagged, sharp teeth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why aren't you getting enough food right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems disappointed with the volume of what it was fed, but it accepted it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We appreciate you letting us pass through there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're going to keep your food and keep going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want to dump all of our rations.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll do create food and water for ourselves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So giving up all the purchased rations right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the Captain, after a while, is like, "Are they wanting us to follow them?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I suppose, I guess so." So in following the creatures, it leads them through some of the tougher ice fields and cuts a day off the journey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you wake up the following morning, they have left, but you've made some time back on the trip.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They'll come back, they like us a lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you want Create Food and Water, or should I take Create Food and Water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So with smooth sailing, you actually, in half a day's travel--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we're going to go ahead and end today's episode.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll pick up next week, with the arrival at Balenpost and your true arrival at Eiselcross.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We haven't even done object identifying anything fancy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hundred percent would have done that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then enchantment is oddly vague, but it makes sense given the more primal and ancient force that perhaps gifted this to the entity that clutched it, where you met on the deck of the ship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I deduce that it was attuned to in an effort to find the Cloven Crystal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, and was attuned to the crystal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say, because of your intelligence, you do discern-- You know what, actually, roll an investigation check for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you deduce that, seemingly, their focus is more on the crystal and the ability to follow the crystal, than to follow Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you say you wanted to look up what the dagger was as well?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would have looked at those, even though you said that the runes or the filigree or whatever had disappeared, I would still go though the effort.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast Banish on it and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I recall, Whisper was found on a ship. Anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can't find the object itself right now, but I can look it up right now in D&D Beyond on my homebrew collection.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I believe Whisper was once found on a sunken ship or someone sank a ship getting it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you have to spend a hit dice to do that ability each time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So those items are at your disposal and we'll pick up as you arrive here at Balenpost.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you all so much for joining us--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And is it Thursday yet? Good night! (cheering)
